Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that President Thomas Jefferson said, “The government will one day be corrupt and filled with liars, and the people will flock to the one who tells the truth."
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence to support the attribution of the quote to Thomas Jefferson.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the quote is accurate and can be attributed to Thomas Jefferson without any evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the quote is a spurious quotation and has been debunked by experts.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the importance and relevance of the quote by using it to make a case for President Donald Trump's reelection.
Understate: There is no understatement bias in the provided claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times as it is consistently debunked by experts.
